channel.title: Comments for page "Mister Tea"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mister Tea"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: could it possibly be that …maybe you need to take mister t(ea) into some place where his mister T ref shines? and maybe he becomes MISTER T! ? or maybe you take him back to the earliest reaper mission? ./cue shoving of the manga in your face aizen. hes done some shit in the PAST. could it possibly be that its shit with taking strawberry and mister tea somewhere on a mission together?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Does Mister Tea secretly actually have a Level 2 form, and is it secretly even MORE awesome than his Level 3?
Buretsu 14:14 9/22/10
McM: Mister Tea's Lvl. 2 is already in the game. Note that I chose my words very carefully.

Is 'Reaper's Game' the same as the plot wherin Mister Tea tries to take over the Wasteland?
Halar Ebon 20:00 2/17/10
McM: No, but Mister Tea is involved.

So it seems that he's trying to say that Mister Tea's Level 2 is his Level 3. Thus he might be the first we witness having a Level 4, or could be an alternate like Cipher is. Either way, I remember SOMEWHERE (Maybe forums?) that McM stated that HQ was a Flashback, or something like that, and thus we might see his Level 2 in HQ. That's the only reason for the vague "something we see in Hero's Quest, or something like that" I wrote above.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: lol this is like the biggest mystery ever to me, if i had enough money for BillyClub that would totally be the question i'd ask. also, wouldnt it make more sense if Tea2 DIDNT have anything to do with HQ since he seems to have been in game for quite a while? i noticed that the notes said he existed quite a while ago. although i dont have access to McM or anything, so if you happen to know for sure its HQ stuff then i believe you

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Level 2 is supposed to be something we see in Hero's Quest, or something like that.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Has anyone asked for hints on the lvl2 form in the Q+A?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Mister Tea is also a reference to, surprise surprise, Mister T, Also the jutsu's name makes it obvious, "Pity the Fool"? Why isn't this on the wiki O.O
